questions.question: The dog wagged ……………………… tail.
questions.description: It's means it is or it has.

questions.question: It is time you ……………………. your hair.
questions.description: After it’s time, a past tense is used with a present meaning.

questions.question: The farmer has a hen that ………………………. golden eggs.
questions.description: To lay is to put something down flat.

questions.question: She does ………………………. work than I do and yet she earns more.
questions.description: Use less with uncountable nouns and fewer with plural nouns.

questions.question: His composition won the first prize because it had the ………………………… mistakes.
questions.description: Use the superlative form after the. Fewest is used with plural nouns and least is used with uncountable nouns.

questions.question: You look  ……………………
questions.description: Look is a copular verb. We use an adjective to modify copular verbs.

questions.question: I can’t make him ……………………. his mind.
questions.description: Make is followed by object + infinitive without to.

questions.question: I don’t speak English very well but I can make myself ……………………….
She will not ………………………. this.
questions.description: The infinitive is used without to after modals.

questions.question: He ……………………….. to her for twenty years.
questions.description: The present perfect is used to talk about an action or situation that started in the past and has continued up to the present.

questions.question: Would you mind ............................. me with the homework?
questions.description: We use ing forms or if-clauses after do you mind…? and would you mind….?
